title: Mcp-Codex-Keeper
description: An intelligent MCP server that provides AI assistants with access to curated documentation and best practices.

NODE_OPTIONS.description: Defines node.js runtime options, such as setting the maximum memory heap size (e.g., --max-old-space-size=256).

npm_config_cache_max.description: Specifies the maximum cache size for npm.
